fullText: Mr. Gyllenhaal brings a welcome specificity to his portrayal of the obsessive artist who sacrifices human connection for the sake of his art, while Ms. Ashford is luminous as Dot, the mistress who loves him but cannot live with his single-minded devotion to painting.
